info.name: DNS SaaS Service Detection
author: noah @thesubtlety
pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 50284
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 50284
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	10800	IN	CNAME	wikicarbone.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 29957
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 29957
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; ANSWER SECTION:
ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	10800	IN	CNAME	wikicarbone.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.
wikicarbone.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	300	IN	CNAME	sc-lb-pool-01.osc-fr1.scalingo-network.com.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
scalingo-network.com.	1800	IN	SOA	burt.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2356778890 10000 2400 604800 1800

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found Connection: close Content-Length: 140 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Sun, 17 Nov 2024 09:47:16 GMT Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: no-referrer Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Request-Id: 5a12ea5b-819a-47f0-9f13-26254258e2d3 Error 
Cannot POST /
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
